I am a second-year PhD student in Public Governance, Management and Policy at [University of Bologna](https://www.unibo.it/en/homepage){style="text-decoration: none"} under the supervision of Prof. Dr. [Pietro Biroli](https://sites.google.com/site/pietrobiroli/){style="text-decoration: none"} (University of Bologna). My research lies in applied microeconomics and economics of education. If you want to get in touch, please don't hesitate to contact me.
